overview: Mitolohiya adapts the story about the origin of The First Coconut Tree and the Creation of Man, using 2D characters with 3D textured environments. Go through an epic adventure featuring Bathala; a god living on a deserted planet who seeks and desires to create the first life on Earth, Galangkalulua; a winged god who wanders the universe, and Ulilangkalulua; a serpent god ruling over the clouds. This animation film is created to promote and preserve Philippine myths about Tagalog gods & goddesses through an entertaining hybrid animation format.
title: Mitolohiya
